0.7.0.en:
Migrated admin UI to @iobroker/adapter-react-v5 (React 18, MUI v6)
Extended Unraid GraphQL schema (CPU package power and temperatures)
Refined API token documentation with Viewer role permissions
Updated dependencies (release-script 5.x, adapter-react-v5 8.x)
0.7.0.de:
Migrated admin UI to @iobroker/adapter-react-v5 (React 18, MUI v6)
Verlängerte ungestrichene Grafik QL-Schema (CPU-Paketleistung und Temperaturen)
Verbesserte API-Token-Dokumentation mit Viewer-Rollenberechtigungen
Aktualisierte Abhängigkeiten (Release-script 5.x, adapter-react-v5 8.x)
0.7.0.ru:
Migrated admin UI to @iobroker/adapter-react-v5 (React 18, MUI v6)

Усовершенствованная документация токенов API с разрешениями ролей Viewer
Обновленные зависимости (релиз-скрипт 5.x, адаптер-реакция-v5 8.x)
0.7.0.pt:
